text: The UHL Best Goaltender (prior to 1997 was Colonial Hockey League Best Goaltender of the Year) was awarded annually to the best goaltender in the United Hockey League (UHL) as selected by league general managers, head coaches, and members of the media. .http://www.oursportscentral.com/services/releases/?id=3153385 ==List of winners== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width=60% |- !Season !Winner !Team !Pts |- | 1991–92 | | Michigan Falcons |- | 1992–93 | | Detroit Falcons |- | 1993–94 | | Thunder Bay Senators |- | 1994–95 | | Detroit Falcons |- | 1995–96 | | Detroit Vipers |- | 1996–97 | | Michigan K-Wings |- | 1997–98 | | Madison Monsters |- | 1998–99 | | Muskegon Fury |- | 1999–00 | | Missouri River Otters |- | 2000–01 | | New Haven Knights |- | 2001–02 | | Muskegon Fury |- | 2002–03 | | Fort Wayne Komets |- | 2003–04 | | Fort Wayne Komets |- | 2004–05 | | Rockford IceHogs |- | 2005–06 | | Kalamazoo Wings |- | 2006–07 | | Fort Wayne Komets |} ==References== Category:Awards established in 1991 Category:United Hockey League trophies and awards Category:1991 establishments in North America
title: UHL Best Goaltender
